instructions.afterLoading: After loading the subtitles and media file:
instructions.editText: Click the subtitle text or timestamps to edit your captions.
instructions.icons: Click the icons to add, merge or delete subtitles.
instructions.dragBorders: Drag the dashed borders on the waveform to change the subtitles' time stamps.
instructions.rememberSave: Remember to click "Save SRT" to save the subtitles when you finish editing!

shortcuts.title: Shortcuts:
shortcuts.tab: to edit the current subtitle text.
shortcuts.arrowsAction: to jump to the previous/next subtitle.
shortcuts.splitSubtitle: to split the subtitle text at the cursor position when editing it.
shortcuts.mergeSubtitle: to merge the current subtitle with the previous one.

dialog.replaceDescription: Loading a new SRT file will replace the current subtitles. Make sure you have downloaded the current SRT first.
